mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(c.test_name),0) AS test_name ,NVL(MAX(b.result_score),0) AS result_score ,NVL(MAX(b.pass_score),0) AS pass_score ,NVL(MAX(b.feedback),0) AS feedback FROM test_targets a JOIN exam_results b ON(a.test_target_id = b.test_target_id) JOIN tests c ON(a.test_id = c.test_id) WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.test_id = #{testId}
SELECT DISTINCT subject_name FROM tests WHERE curriculum_id = (SELECT curriculum_id FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId})
SELECT COUNT(a.test_id) FROM tests a JOIN test_targets b ON(a.test_id = b.test_id) JOIN users d ON(b.user_id = d.user_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{userId}

WITH b as (SELECT test_id ,subject_id ,COUNT(quiz_id) as quizIdCnt ,SUM(quiz_score) as quizScore FROM quizbox GROUP BY test_id ,subject_id) SELECT a.test_id ,a.test_content ,a.test_time ,a.test_date ,a.test_name ,b.subject_id ,c.curriculum_name ,quizIdCnt ,quizScore FROM tests a JOIN b ON(a.test_id = b.test_id) JOIN curriculum c ON(a.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id) WHERE a.test_id = #{testId}

WITH a AS( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn ,a.quiz_id ,a.example_num ,b.quiz_score FROM (SELECT quiz_id, example_num FROM answers ORDER BY quiz_id, DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) a JOIN quizbox b ON(a.quiz_id = b.quiz_id) WHERE b.test_id = #{testId}) SELECT ROWNUM AS rn ,aa.quiz_id ,aa.one ,aa.two ,aa.three ,aa.four ,aa.five ,aa.quiz_score FROM (SELECT a.quiz_id ,MAX(DECODE(MOD(a.rn,5), 1, a.example_num)) AS one ,MAX(DECODE(MOD(a.rn,5), 2, a.example_num)) AS two ,MAX(DECODE(MOD(a.rn,5), 3, a.example_num)) AS three ,MAX(DECODE(MOD(a.rn,5), 4, a.example_num)) AS four ,MAX(DECODE(MOD(a.rn,5), 0, a.example_num)) AS five ,a.quiz_score FROM a GROUP BY a.quiz_id ,a.quiz_score) aa

SELECT DISTINCT a.test_id ,a.test_time ,a.test_name ,b.subject_id ,d.name FROM tests a JOIN quizbox b ON(a.test_id = b.test_id) JOIN test_targets c ON(a.test_id = c.test_id) JOIN users d ON(c.user_id = d.user_id) WHERE a.test_id = #{testId} AND d.user_id = #{userId}

WITH a AS( SELECT b.quiz_id ,b.quiz_content ,b.quiz_score ,a.text_content ,a.example_num ,b.subject_id FROM answers a JOIN quizbox b ON(a.quiz_id = b.quiz_id) WHERE b.test_id = #{testId} AND b.quiz_id = #{quizId} ORDER BY a.example_num) SELECT quiz_id ,quiz_content ,quiz_score ,subject_id ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, #{one}, text_content)) AS oneContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, #{two}, text_content)) AS twoContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, #{three}, text_content)) AS threeContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, #{four}, text_content)) AS fourContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, #{five}, text_content)) AS fiveContent FROM a GROUP BY quiz_id ,quiz_content ,quiz_score ,subject_id

SELECT c.name ,d.subject_id ,a.result_score ,a.pass_score ,a.is_reexam ,d.subject_id ,b.test_id ,d.subject_name FROM exam_results a JOIN test_targets b ON(a.test_target_id = b.test_target_id) JOIN users c ON(b.user_id = c.user_id) JOIN subjects d ON(a.subject_id = d.subject_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.test_id = #{testId}

WITH a AS( SELECT a.example_num ,a.text_content ,a.example_answer ,b.quiz_id ,b.quiz_content ,b.quiz_score ,c.quiz_solution ,d.test_answer ,d.is_correct ,d.test_result_id FROM answers a JOIN quizbox b ON(a.quiz_id = b.quiz_id) JOIN quizes c ON(b.quiz_id = c.quiz_id) JOIN test_results d ON(b.quiz_id = d.quiz_id) JOIN exam_results e ON(d.result_id = e.result_id) WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND b.test_id = #{testId} AND e.test_target_id = (SELECT test_target_id FROM test_targets WHERE test_id = #{testId} AND user_id = #{userId}))
SELECT test_result_id ,quiz_id ,quiz_content ,quiz_score ,quiz_solution ,MAX(DECODE(example_answer, 1, example_num)) AS example_num ,MAX(test_answer) AS test_answer ,MAX(is_correct) AS is_correct ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, 1, text_content)) AS oneContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, 2, text_content)) AS twoContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, 3, text_content)) AS threeContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, 4, text_content)) AS fourContent ,MAX(DECODE(example_num, 5, text_content)) AS fiveContent FROM a GROUP BY test_result_id ,quiz_id ,quiz_content ,quiz_score ,quiz_solution ORDER BY a.test_result_id
